name: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Specified fence is removed
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Visual Inspection
INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY: Internal Project Engineer / Project Manager
1.2 - Segregation of Fence Timber and Wire
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Wire is removed from removed fencing and scrapped, timber fencing is segregated from other waste
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Visual Inspection
INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY: Internal Project Engineer / Project Manager
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Posts are to be 2.7m long, 110mm small end diameter, treated to hazard class H4
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Delivery Dockets
INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY: Internal Project Engineer / Project Manager
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Strainer posts are to be 3m long, 175mm small end diameter, treated to hazard class H4
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Delivery Dockets
INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY: Internal Project Engineer / Project Manager
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Fence mesh is to be 2.5mm diameter high tensile zinc-aluminium coated wire, 13 wires, 150mm stay wire spacing, 1.9m high (Cyclone 13/1900/150HT or similar)
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Delivery Dockets
INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY: Internal Project Engineer / Project Manager
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Post and strainer staples must be zinc aluminium coated, a minimum gauge of 4mm, at least 50mm long and barbed.
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Delivery Dockets
INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY: Internal Project Engineer / Project Manager
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Minimum height of gate to be 1.9m
• Gates are to be hot-dip galvanized
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Delivery Dockets
INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY: Internal Project Engineer / Project Manager
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Hinges and gudgeons to be a minimum diameter of 20mm
• Hinges and gudgeons are to be hot-dip galvanized
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Delivery Dockets
INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY: Internal Project Engineer / Project Manager
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Posts shall be at 5m centres, driven 0.7m into the ground
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Visual Inspection
INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY: Internal Project Engineer / Project Manager

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Strainers are to be installed at all changes in direction of the fence and at both sides of the gate.  Strainers shall also be installed on straight lines of fence so that the maximum distance between two strained posts on flat terrain is 400m.
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Visual Inspection
INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY: Internal Project Engineer / Project Manager
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Must have a single strained bottom wire. The line wire must be attached to, or close to, the bottom wire of the netting with a maximum spacing between wires of 50mm.
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Visual Inspection
INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY: Internal Project Engineer / Project Manager
